details.sectionContent: This is Creative Design Event.You have to use Creativity, Designing and Branding Skills.
This is event is based on the basics of Graphic Design. Logo Designing is the Central Idea of this Technical Event.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
> In this round Logo of well-known brands will be shown and the participants have to identify that Logo and give answer.
 > The Logo would be given in Image Format and participant would be given 20 min to find the names of all the Questions.

> Make Your Brand. Name it. Create a logo of your own Brand.
 > You can use any Designing Software like Adobe Illustrator or online logo creation tools. The selection would be on the basis of Creativity.

> This is the Final Round. This is the last touch of your Designing. 
 > In this Round you have to Develop a UI (User Interface). 
 > You have to submit the Image of your UI. 
 > You can use any tool like Figma, Adode Photoshop or any other Photo editors.

details.sectionContent: This event is based on your technical knowledge and programming skills.
An understanding of problem solving and algorithm implementation will be developed inside the participantâ€™s mind.

sectionContent.sectionContent: In this round, Google Drive will be given and the password would be there to open it and participant has to solve the questions.

> There will be different and interesting tasks,  participants have to perform it using their intelligence and technical knowledge. 
 > The problem would be given and its code has to be formed to find output.
 > Time based Round.

details.sectionContent: This event, presented by the IT department is a fusion of the corporate world that includes the share market and the technical field. Combined, these 2 components run almost all of the world. How much do you know about it?
This event tests the knowledge by crossword, quiz and problem solving abilities. Careful, individuality and teamwork both are important to excel here.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
> Participants will have to solve a crossword puzzle related to mobile applications. 
 > Selection will be based on the scores. 
> In case of same scores, the faster one to submit will be chosen for next round.

> Participants will have to appear in a quiz related to stock market and industries. 
 > People for next round will be chosen through scores.

> Pairs will be participating in this round. 
 > Both players will be given a set of password protected files that contain a question. 
 > Answer to the respective question would be the password for the other persons question and vice-versa.

> Every finalist will be shown a set of logos. 
 > Players will have to guess the logo. 
 > The player who correctly answers most logos in one minute will be the winner.

details.sectionContent: An event to test your technical knowledge, present your opinions and showcase your skills!

The first round will be a quiz, where participants have to choose an appropriate question for the given answer. The second round is a debate round. And, in the third round the participants will be given some tasks and they have to complete it in certain time limit.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
> Selecting appropriate question for the given answer from the multiple choices. 
 > The questions will be selected from subjects like Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Basic Programming. 
 > Top 40 participants according based on scores will be selected for next round.

> A debate competition. 
 > Topics will be of modern and developing technologies. 
 > Points will be given by faculty of the college. 
 > Top 10 students based on   scores will be selected for next round.

> There will be different and interesting tasks and participants have to perform it using their intelligence and technical knowledge. 
 > Time based Round 
 > Top three participants to complete their respective task first will be chosen as winners.
